statements: SELECT * FROM sponsorships
SELECT club_name, sponsor_name, sponsorship_amount FROM sponsorships WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT club_name, sponsor_name FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsorship_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM sponsorships WHERE club_name = 'Real Madrid' ORDER BY sponsorship_amount DESC
SELECT sponsor_name, end_date FROM sponsorships WHERE start_date < '2022-07-01'
SELECT sponsorship_id, club_name, sponsor_name, start_date, end_date, sponsorship_amount FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsorship_amount > 5000 ORDER BY club_name ASC, sponsorship_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM sponsorships WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT club_name, sponsor_name, sponsorship_amount FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsor_name LIKE '%Corp%' ORDER BY sponsorship_amount DESC, club_name ASC
SELECT sponsorship_id, club_name, sponsor_name, start_date, end_date, sponsorship_amount FROM sponsorships WHERE club_name IN ('Barcelona', 'Real Madrid') ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT sponsor_name, SUM(sponsorship_amount) AS total_amount FROM sponsorships GROUP BY sponsor_name HAVING total_amount > 10000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsor_type = 'Gold';
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsorship_amount FROM sponsorships ORDER BY sponsorship_amount DESC;
SELECT club_id, COUNT(*) FROM contracts GROUP BY club_id;
SELECT * FROM sponsorships WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_type, sponsorship_amount FROM sponsorships ORDER BY sponsor_name ASC, sponsorship_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsor_type = 'Gold' ORDER BY sponsorship_amount DESC;
SELECT club_id, sponsor_name, sponsorship_amount FROM sponsorships WHERE sponsor_name LIKE '%son%' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT sponsor_name, sponsor_type, SUM(sponsorship_amount) AS total_amount FROM sponsorships GROUP BY sponsor_name, sponsor_type;
SELECT c.club_id, c.contract_amount, s.sponsor_name FROM contracts c INNER JOIN sponsorships s ON c.sponsor_id = s.sponsorship_id WHERE c.contract_type = 'Long-term';
SELECT sponsor_name, COUNT(*) AS contracts_count FROM sponsorships s LEFT JOIN contracts c ON s.sponsorship_id = c.sponsor_id GROUP BY sponsor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY sponsor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM sponsorship_deals;
SELECT sponsor_name, start_date, end_date FROM sponsorship_deals WHERE club_id = 1;
SELECT club_id, sponsor_name FROM sponsorship_deals ORDER BY sponsor_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, cost FROM advertising_contracts WHERE cost > 5000;
SELECT transaction_date, amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE club_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM sponsorship_deals WHERE sponsor_name = 'Nike';
SELECT club_id, sponsor_name, start_date FROM sponsorship_deals WHERE club_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT club_id, sponsor_name, end_date FROM sponsorship_deals WHERE sponsor_name LIKE '%Adidas%' AND club_id IN (1, 2);
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT club_id, agency_name, campaign_name, cost FROM advertising_contracts WHERE club_id = 3 AND cost > 5000 ORDER BY cost DESC, campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals;
SELECT sponsor_name, amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT end_date, sponsor_name, start_date FROM SponsorshipDeals ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT id, sponsor_name FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE sponsor_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM AdvertisingContracts WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT sponsor_name, start_date, amount FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT advertiser_name, end_date, duration FROM AdvertisingContracts WHERE duration >= 6 ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT id, transaction_type, amount FROM FinancialTransactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Income' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT club_name, city, stadium_name FROM FootballClubs WHERE city = 'London' ORDER BY club_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SponsorshipDeals WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM football_clubs;
SELECT club_name, city FROM football_clubs WHERE stadium_capacity > 50000;
SELECT sponsor_name, industry, country FROM sponsors WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT deal_id, sponsor_id, start_date, end_date FROM sponsorship_deals WHERE amount > 100000;
SELECT transaction_id, club_id, amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sponsorship_deals WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT club_id, sponsor_id, amount FROM sponsorship_deals WHERE amount > 50000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT sponsor_id, industry FROM sponsors WHERE country = 'USA' LIMIT 5;
SELECT contract_id, advertiser_id, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_contracts WHERE cost < 10000 AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT club_id, transaction_date, amount, transaction_type FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Payment' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
